template.title: JavaScript基礎演習
template.description: 初心者向けJavaScriptプログラミング基礎コース。15週の実践的な課題を通じて、JavaScriptの基本からDOM操作、非同期処理、外部API連携まで段階的に学習します。

JavaScript基礎演習.title: JavaScript Basic Course
JavaScript基礎演習.description: Beginner-friendly JavaScript programming fundamentals course. Learn step by step from JavaScript basics to DOM manipulation, asynchronous processing, and external API integration through 15 weeks of practical exercises.

JavaScript基礎.title: JavaScript Basic Course
JavaScript基礎.description: Beginner-friendly JavaScript programming fundamentals course. Learn step by step from JavaScript basics to DOM manipulation, asynchronous processing, and external API integration through 15 weeks of practical exercises.

JavaScript基礎.title: JavaScript Basics
JavaScript基礎.description: JavaScript basic syntax, conditionals, arrays, loops, functions

DOM操作.title: DOM Manipulation
DOM操作.description: Getting and manipulating DOM elements, event handling, creating, adding, and deleting elements
deliverables: Can get and manipulate DOM elements
Can dynamically create, add, and delete elements

中間評価と復習.title: Mid-term Evaluation and Review
中間評価と復習.description: Comprehensive review and mid-term evaluation of weeks 1-7

データ管理と非同期処理.title: Data Management and Asynchronous Processing
データ管理と非同期処理.description: WebStorage, JSON, asynchronous processing, external API integration

総合課題.title: Comprehensive Project
総合課題.description: Comprehensive web application development utilizing previous learning
deliverables: Integration and practice of learned content

第1週：JavaScriptの基礎・条件分岐.title: Week 1: JavaScript Basics and Conditionals
第1週：JavaScriptの基礎・条件分岐.description: JavaScript basic syntax, variables, data types, operators, if statements, switch statements

subtasks.JavaScriptとは・開発環境の準備: What is JavaScript & dev environment setup

JavaScriptとは.title: What is JavaScript
JavaScriptとは.content: Runs in browser; dynamic pages, events; use with HTML/CSS. Embed: inline, <script>, or external file.

変数とデータ型.title: Variables and data types
変数とデータ型.content: let/const (block scope); var avoid. Primitives: Number, String, Boolean, undefined, null. Object, Array. typeof.

演算子.title: Operators
演算子.content: Arithmetic +-*/%**; assignment += etc; comparison == vs ===; logical &&||!; string +.

if文の実践例.title: if practical example
if文の実践例.content: Login check, discount by amount, even/odd.

switch文.title: switch statement
switch文.content: switch(expr){ case val: break; default }. Strict ===. Fall-through when break omitted.

switch文の実践例.title: switch practical example
switch文の実践例.content: Command handler, user role, HTTP status.

第2週：配列・ループ・関数.title: Week 2: Arrays, Loops, and Functions
第2週：配列・ループ・関数.description: Arrays, loops (for, while, forEach), function definition and calls

配列の主なメソッド.title: Main array methods
配列の主なメソッド.content: push, pop, unshift, shift; indexOf, includes; slice, concat.

for文とwhile文.title: for and while
for文とwhile文.content: for(init;cond;up){}; for-of; while(cond){}; do-while; break, continue.

ループの実践例.title: Loop example
ループの実践例.content: Times table, filter evens, find name, sum with while.

関数の基本.title: Function basics
関数の基本.content: function fn(){}, const fn=function(){}, arrow ()=>{}. Params, default, return. Scope.

関数の実践例.title: Function example
関数の実践例.content: sumArray, averageArray, findMax, reverseString, isEven, filterEven.

第3週：DOM.title: Week 3: DOM
第3週：DOM.description: DOM (Document Object Model) basics, getting and manipulating elements

DOMとは.title: What is DOM
DOMとは.content: Tree of HTML; get/change content, style, attributes; add/remove nodes; events.

内容変更の実践例.title: Content change example
内容変更の実践例.content: title textContent; div innerHTML; input value; dynamic list.

スタイル操作の実践例.title: Style example
スタイル操作の実践例.content: box styles; toggle class on click; image switch; conditional style by score.

第4週：イベント処理.title: Week 4: Event Handling
第4週：イベント処理.description: Event listeners, click events, input events, keyboard events

イベントとは.title: What are events
イベントとは.content: click, dblclick, mouseenter/leave; keydown/up; submit, change, input, focus, blur; DOMContentLoaded, load, resize, scroll.

イベント処理の実践例.title: Event handling example
イベント処理の実践例.content: Click count; input→output; mouseenter/leave; keydown; DOMContentLoaded.

イベントオブジェクト.title: Event object
イベントオブジェクト.content: e.type, e.target, e.currentTarget; clientX/Y; e.key; e.preventDefault(), e.stopPropagation().

イベントオブジェクトの実践例.title: Event object example
イベントオブジェクトの実践例.content: Form preventDefault; mousemove coords; target info; Ctrl+S, Esc; email validation.

第5週：ループとイベント.title: Week 5: Loops and Events
第5週：ループとイベント.description: Combining loops with event handling, practical exercises

ループで複数要素にイベントを追加.title: Add events in loop
ループで複数要素にイベントを追加.content: querySelectorAll + forEach; same or per-index handler.

イベント委譲（Event Delegation）.title: Event delegation
イベント委譲（Event Delegation）.content: Listener on parent; if (e.target.matches(...)) handle. Works for dynamically added elements.

ToDoリストの実装例.title: ToDo list example
ToDoリストの実装例.content: addTodo, keypress Enter; list.addEventListener click → delete or toggle completed.

第6週：Elementの作成・追加.title: Week 6: Creating and Adding Elements
第6週：Elementの作成・追加.description: Creating DOM elements dynamically, adding elements to the page

要素の作成と追加.title: Create and add elements
要素の作成と追加.content: createElement; textContent/innerHTML/attributes; appendChild; insertBefore; append, prepend.

要素作成の実践例.title: Create element example
要素作成の実践例.content: createListItem; createCard with title, desc, button; append to container.

DocumentFragmentの活用.title: DocumentFragment
DocumentFragmentの活用.content: createDocumentFragment(); append to fragment in loop; one appendChild(fragment). Fewer reflows.

DocumentFragmentの実践例.title: DocumentFragment example
DocumentFragmentの実践例.content: renderProducts into fragment then append; table rows in fragment.

第7週：Elementの削除・動的なElementへのイベント追加.title: Week 7: Deleting Elements and Adding Events to Dynamic Elements
第7週：Elementの削除・動的なElementへのイベント追加.description: Removing elements, event delegation, adding events to dynamically created elements

要素の削除.title: Removing elements
要素の削除.content: element.remove(); parent.removeChild(child); clear: innerHTML='', while firstChild remove, replaceChildren().

削除の実践例.title: Remove example
削除の実践例.content: delete-btn in li calls li.remove(); deleteSelected by :checked; clearAll confirm.

cloneNode() - 要素の複製.title: cloneNode
cloneNode() - 要素の複製.content: cloneNode(false) shallow; cloneNode(true) deep. No event listeners; watch duplicate ids.

動的フォームフィールドの追加.title: Dynamic form fields
動的フォームフィールドの追加.content: Clone template; set value/name; removeBtn removes row; keep at least one.

第8週：予備日（中間評価週）.title: Week 8: Reserve Day (Mid-term Evaluation Week)
第8週：予備日（中間評価週）.description: Comprehensive review and mid-term assignment for weeks 1-7

第1週～第7週の復習ポイント.title: Review points 1-7
第1週～第7週の復習ポイント.content: let/const, types, operators, if/switch, loops, functions; getElement*, querySelector*; textContent, innerHTML, style, classList; addEventListener, delegation; createElement, append, remove, fragment, cloneNode.

中間課題：ToDoアプリ完全版.title: Mid-term: full ToDo app
中間課題：ToDoアプリ完全版.content: todos array; add, delete, toggle; renderTodos with fragment; filter all/active/completed; dataset.id.

第9週：WebStorageの利用.title: Week 9: Using WebStorage
第9週：WebStorageの利用.description: Data persistence using localStorage and sessionStorage

WebStorageとは.title: What is WebStorage
WebStorageとは.content: localStorage (persistent); sessionStorage (tab session). setItem, getItem, removeItem, clear. Strings only.

localStorageの基本的な使い方.title: localStorage basics
localStorageの基本的な使い方.content: setItem/getItem; number via parseInt; array/object with JSON.stringify/parse.

ToDoアプリ with localStorage.title: ToDo with localStorage
ToDoアプリ with localStorage.content: todos = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('todos'))||[]; saveTodos() on change; load on DOMContentLoaded.

第10週：JSONについて.title: Week 10: About JSON
第10週：JSONについて.description: JSON format, parsing and stringifying JSON data

JSONとは.title: What is JSON
JSONとは.content: Lightweight text format; {} and []; double quotes for keys; types: string, number, boolean, null, array, object.

JSON.stringify() と JSON.parse().title: stringify and parse
JSON.stringify() と JSON.parse().content: JSON.stringify(obj); JSON.parse(str); try/catch for parse; with localStorage.

JSONデータの実践例.title: JSON example
JSONデータの実践例.content: Parse users array; filter/map; stringify; config save/load.

第11週：非同期処理・タイマー関数.title: Week 11: Asynchronous Processing and Timer Functions

タイマー関数とは.title: Timer functions
タイマー関数とは.content: setTimeout(fn, ms) once; clearTimeout(id); setInterval(fn, ms); clearInterval(id).

async/awaitとは.title: async/await
async/awaitとは.content: async fn returns Promise; await waits; try/catch; sequential vs Promise.all parallel.

実践例：カウントダウン付きメッセージ表示.title: Countdown example
実践例：カウントダウン付きメッセージ表示.content: wait(sec) Promise; showCountdown async loop; btn disabled during run.

第12週：外部APIと非同期通信.title: Week 12: External APIs and Asynchronous Communication
第12週：外部APIと非同期通信.description: Fetch API, making HTTP requests, handling API responses

fetch APIとは.title: What is fetch API
fetch APIとは.content: fetch(url) returns Promise; response.json(); method, headers, body for POST/PUT/DELETE; response.ok, status.

REST APIとは.title: What is REST API
REST APIとは.content: GET/POST/PUT/DELETE on resources; JSONPlaceholder for practice; query params.

エラーハンドリング.title: Error handling
エラーハンドリング.content: try/catch network; if(!response.ok) throw; status 404/500; retry, timeout, user-facing message.

実践例：天気情報の取得と表示.title: Weather fetch example
実践例：天気情報の取得と表示.content: getWeather(city); check response.ok; displayWeather(data); JSONPlaceholder practice.
